title: Apple Releases iOS 26.3 and iPadOS 26.3 with Improved iPhone to Android Migration, Notification Support for Third-Party Smartwatches in the EU, and More
tags: When downloading an app from the App Store, VoiceOver no longer speaks extraneous text prior to the download progress;When the Eloquence Community Dictionary is Enabled, Eloquence Does Not Speak Mixed-Case Words Like "iOS" Correctly.;https://support.apple.com/100100;https://www.apple.com/os/ios;https://support.apple.com/125039
